quoteText: This Cookie Statement explains how Syniverse Technologies and its group companies (collectively “Syniverse”, "we", "us", and "ours") use cookies and similar technologies to recognise you when you visit our websites at www.syniverse.com
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
